feature.name: TM8 Mode Switching
feature.summary: The TM8 Mode Switching feature enables the UE to dynamically switch between TM8 and

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.transmissionMode
parameters.description: Defines the Transmission Mode used for the UEs that are connected to                                 the cell.  The TM8 Mode Switching feature is available when the                                     EUtranCellTDD.transmissionMode attribute is                                 set to either 3 or 8.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011996 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011996 MO instance.
